item.description:
John Bliss of Turkey Hill Farm (http://www.backcovemi...) will talk to us about "Community Supported Agriculture". Under this concept, you pay a yearly membership, and in season, come and pick up your allotment of fresh, local produce! A good step towards local sustainability and supporting your local farmers besides!

Voluntary donations will be accepted to cover costs.
item.name: Portland Maine Oil Awareness October Meetup
